analysis.description:
ETHSurge.random (/unique_chucks/30/0x61143a1a702151330490822adafac1039e8adac0.sol#235-255) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- (randomNumber % 13) % 19 == 0

ETHSurge.random (/unique_chucks/30/0x61143a1a702151330490822adafac1039e8adac0.sol#235-255) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- (randomNumber % 13) % 19 == 0 (/unique_chucks/30/0x61143a1a702151330490822adafac1039e8adac0.sol#250-253)
